mapper.select:
SELECT SUBSTR(ac.ownerJid, 1, LOCATE('@',ac.ownerJid)-1) 'from', SUBSTR(ac.withJid, 1, LOCATE('@',ac.withJid)-1) 'to', am.`subject` 'contentType', am.direction, am.body content, am.time ct
FROM ( SELECT * FROM archiveconversations WHERE ownerJid = #{ownerJid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) ac LEFT JOIN archivemessages am ON ac.conversationId = am.conversationId ORDER BY ct DESC LIMIT 300;
